viewData.name: Lenovo 11.6" Ideapad 130S Laptop
viewData.short_description: Buy Lenovo 11.6" Ideapad 130S Laptop featuring 1.1 GHz Intel Pentium Silver N5000, 4GB LPDDR4 | 64GB eMMC Flash Storage 11.6" 1366 x 768 Anti-Glare Display. Review Lenovo 130S
viewData.long_description: The 11.6" Ideapad 130S Notebook from Lenovo is a budget-friendly laptop designed for users looking to accomplish everyday tasks. Specs-wise, it's equipped with a 1.1 GHz Intel Pentium Silver N5000 quad-core processor, 4GB of LPDDR4 RAM, 64GB of eMMC storage, and integrated Intel UHD graphics. With these combined, this system can be used to browse the internet, compose and edit documents, stream online videos, and more. Other integrated features include 802.11ac Wi-Fi, Bluetooth 4.0, USB Type-A and Type-C ports, an HDMI port, a webcam, speakers, microphones, and a 3.5mm combo audio jack. The operating system installed is Windows 10 S, which is a slimmed down version of Windows 10 that can only utilize apps within the Windows Store.
